name: ButtonBar
desc: An end-aligned row of buttons, laying out into a column if there is not enough horizontal space.

fields.name: alignment
fields.desc: How the children should be placed along the horizontal axis.

fields.name: mainAxisSize
fields.desc: How much horizontal space is available. See [Row.mainAxisSize].

fields.name: buttonTextTheme
fields.desc: Overrides the surrounding [ButtonBarThemeData.buttonTextTheme] to define a button's base colors, size, internal padding and shape.

fields.name: buttonMinWidth
fields.desc: Overrides the surrounding [ButtonThemeData.minWidth] to define a button's minimum width.

fields.name: buttonHeight
fields.desc: Overrides the surrounding [ButtonThemeData.height] to define a button's minimum height.

fields.name: buttonPadding
fields.desc: Overrides the surrounding [ButtonThemeData.padding] to define the padding for a button's child (typically the button's label).

fields.name: buttonAlignedDropdown
fields.desc: Overrides the surrounding [ButtonThemeData.alignedDropdown] to define whether a [DropdownButton] menu's width will match the button's width.

fields.name: layoutBehavior
fields.desc: Defines whether a [ButtonBar] should size itself with a minimum size constraint or with padding.

fields.name: overflowDirection
fields.desc: Defines the vertical direction of a [ButtonBar]'s children if it overflows.

fields.name: overflowButtonSpacing
fields.desc: The spacing between buttons when the button bar overflows.
